comments:
eclipse.buildId=I200410130800
java.version=1.4.2_05
java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=macosx, ARCH=ppc, WS=carbon, NL=en_US

When creating a launch configuration the stack below is produced. However, you
can ignore the error dialog and continue creating the run configuration. You
can't actually run it though (the run button is disabled), the dialog has to be
closed and then the configuration can be run as usual.
